name: Air Racing VR
description:
This is an air Parkour game combined with VR. You need to fly the plane from the first perspective, rush to the end at the fastest speed, and be alert to your opponent's attack along the way. Of course, you can also attack your opponent. In addition to man-machine racing, you can also race online in the air. Call friends to join the game.

Gameplay:
In the prop mode, you can pick up various props during the flight to obtain different skills to get ahead and even attack your opponent;
The extreme speed mode is a pure speed contest. During the flight, you can get a short acceleration by crossing the acceleration circle to increase your flying speed and surpass your opponent;
Survival mode means to ensure that you are in the forefront of the team as much as possible during the flight. After flying for a period of time, the countdown to the last elimination will start. If you are not at the end at the end of each countdown, you will not be eliminated. The final countdown will still be over. Survival means victory.

Featured scene:
See the small island in the romantic and tranquil sea at a glance;
The sky is full of yellow sand, but there are deserts hidden in the oasis;
Snow-capped mountains, glaciers, silver fir, the scenery of the Northland;
Strange peaks stand, immortal spirits are lingering, and great mountains and rivers. of the ancient Chinese.
More scenes will continue to be updated.
